bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Cannabis Distribution Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Disclosure of cannabis records and information
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 14 (2) (a) of the Act, a cannabis official may disclose cannabis records and information as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for the purposes of the administration or enforcement of the Act, the Cannabis Control and Licensing Act, the Liquor Control and Licensing Act, the Liquor Distribution Act, the regulations under any of those Acts or an enactment of British Columbia or Canada relating to taxation;
for the purposes of the administration of the Cannabis Act (Canada);
in a proceeding before a court or a judicial or quasi-judicial tribunal;
if an enactment of British Columbia or Canada requires or authorizes the disclosure;
to the legal counsel of the person in possession of the cannabis records and information;
for the purpose of selling non-confidential sales data;
for the purpose of selling to a person sales data relating to the personâ€™s sales of cannabis;
for the purpose of the compilation of statistical information by the government or the government of Canada.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Cannabis records and information supplied to the government in confidence
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of section 21 (1) (b) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act, the following classes of cannabis records and information, whether or not supplied to the government, are deemed to be supplied to the government in confidence:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: cannabis records and information related to the acquisition by the government of cannabis from a federal producer or other person who supplies cannabis to the government;
cannabis records and information related to the acquisition by the government of cannabis accessories from a person who supplies cannabis accessories to the government;
cannabis records and information related to the sale of cannabis or cannabis accessories acquired by the government from a person referred to in paragraph (a) or (b).
